Shell Cove enters tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {U}.
{9}{GU}: Shell Cove becomes a 7/7 green and blue Leviathan creature with ward {3} until end of turn. It’s still a land. This ability costs {X} less to activate, where X is your devotion to green and blue. Activate only once each turn.
